text: 28 is a year in the 1st century. It was a leap year starting on Thursday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Silanus and Nerva. == Events == * King Daru of Baekje succeeded the throne of Baekje in the Korean peninsula. * The Frisians make a treaty with the Romans to avoid conquest. * The Criminal Tribes Act of 1871 was amended by the British Raj within British India in January, 1897. == Births == * Emperor Ming of Han (d. 75) == Deaths == *King Onjo of Baekje Category:20s
